mapper.sql: select ticket_type,ticket_tax,self_name,project_id, project_code, project_name, project_trade, project_owner, purch_company, project_total_amount, project_leader, project_gross_margin, project_gross_profit, project_net_profit, project_package_amount, project_desc, project_status, is_deleted, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, check_content, file_name, project_time_start, project_time_end, project_check_status, project_ticket_status, project_contract_status, project_acceptance_status, project_dutypaid_status, place_code,purch_company_taxid from self_project

select t.project_id, t.project_code, t.project_name, t.project_trade, t.project_owner, t.purch_company, t.project_total_amount, t.project_leader, t.project_gross_margin, t.project_gross_profit, t.project_net_profit, t.project_package_amount, t.project_desc, t.project_status, t.is_deleted, t.create_by, t.update_by, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.check_content, t.file_name, t.project_time_start, t.project_time_end, t.project_check_status, t.project_ticket_status, t.project_contract_status, t.project_acceptance_status, t.project_dutypaid_status, t.place_code,t.purch_company_taxid,t.self_name,t.ticket_type,t.ticket_tax, A.ticket_id, A.project_code, A.ticket_amount, A.ticket_type, A.ticket_content, A.ticket_remark, A.ticket_tax, A.ticket_code, A.ticket_time, A.file_name, A.ticket_type_code, A.create_by, A.update_by, A.create_time, A.update_time,B.self_name,B.tax_id,B.nature_business,B.industry_type,B.industry_tax,B.is_active, C.place_name,C.place_status from self_project t Left JOIN self_ticket A ON t.project_code = A.project_code JOIN self_employed B ON t.project_owner = B.self_code JOIN business_place C ON t.place_code = C.place_code
mapper.select: where t.is_deleted=1 AND A.is_deleted=1 AND t.project_code=#{projectCode}
mapper.insert:
insert into self_project
project_code, project_name, project_trade, project_owner, purch_company, project_total_amount, project_leader, project_gross_margin, project_gross_profit, project_net_profit, project_package_amount, project_desc, project_status, is_deleted, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, check_content, file_name, project_time_start, project_time_end, project_check_status, project_ticket_status, project_contract_status, project_acceptance_status, project_dutypaid_status, place_code, purch_company_taxid, self_name, ticket_type, ticket_tax,
#{projectCode}, #{projectName}, #{projectTrade}, #{projectOwner}, #{purchCompany}, #{projectTotalAmount}, #{projectLeader}, #{projectGrossMargin}, #{projectGrossProfit}, #{projectNetProfit}, #{projectPackageAmount}, #{projectDesc}, #{projectStatus}, #{isDeleted}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{checkContent}, #{fileName}, #{projectTimeStart}, #{projectTimeEnd}, #{projectCheckStatus}, #{projectTicketStatus}, #{projectContractStatus}, #{projectAcceptanceStatus}, #{projectDutypaidStatus}, #{placeCode}, #{purchCompanyTaxid}, #{selfName}, #{ticketType}, #{ticketTax},
mapper.delete:
delete from self_project where project_id in
#{projectId}
mapper.update:
update self_project set is_deleted=0 where project_id in
#{projectId}
